title: The school of the heart, or, The heart of it self gone away from God, brought back again to him, and instructed by him in XLVII emblems.
author: Harvey, Christopher, 1597-1663.
notes: Adapted by Christopher Harvey from Bendictus van Haeften's "Schola cordis."  Sometimes wrongly ascribed to Francis Quarles. Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
